outputs.output_descr:
India's HCFC Phase-out Management Plan (HPMP Stage-I) comprises of a combination of interventions such as technology
transfer investments, policies and regulations, technical assistance, training, awareness and communications and management,
coordination and monitoring in select HCFC consuming sectors, to be implemented over four years from 2012 to 2015, to enable
India's compliance with the 2013 and 2015 control targets for consumption

coordination and monitoring in select HCFC consuming sectors, to be implemented over four years from 2013 to 2015, to enable
India's compliance with the 2013 and 2015 control targets for consumption

project_descr: Hydro Chloro Fluoro Carbon (HCFC) Phase-out Management Plan (HPMP) Stage-I for India for compliance with the 2013 and 2015 control targets
project_title: HCFC Phase-out Management Plan (HPMP) Stage-I for India
